h1: How Many Calories in a Pepperoni Pizza Slice?
assumptions: Standard 14-inch pizza, one slice (1/8th of whole), with mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, tomato sauce, and wheat-based crust; baked.

quick_answer.text: One slice of pepperoni pizza typically contains about 285 calories and 12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a pepperoni pizza slice?
faqs.a: Approximately 285 kcal for a standard slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros in one pepperoni pizza slice?
faqs.a: About 36 g carbs, 12 g protein, 10 g fat.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Yes, one slice has around 640 mg sodium from cheese, sauce, and pepperoni.

faqs.q: How does crust type affect calories in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Thick crust adds ~50 kcal per slice; thin crust reduces it.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie pepperoni pizza options?
faqs.a: Opt for thin crust, less cheese, or veggie toppings to cut ~50-100 kcal per slice.
